subject: Re: Learning JUnit
msgSnippet: Thanks Elliotte. I want my course to cover all important aspects used in practice regarding testing. I am willing to increase the duration. Let me update the
messageBody:
Thanks Elliotte.

I want my course to cover all important aspects used in practice
regarding testing. I am willing to increase the duration. Let me update
the name of the course to reflect the same.

Course: Testing in Practice
Prerequiste: Core Java
Duration of the course: 2 days
Contents:

* Using Junit for unit testing
* Mock objects with JMock
* Using DBUnit for persistance testing.
* Using Fit for acceptance/system testing
* Eclipse plugin for JUnit

If possible, I would appreciate comments from the group regarding topics
to be added in /deleted from this course.

Regards............Vijay

www.geocites.com/vijay_nathani



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
